definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Scuffing the ball, she says, disrupts the already turbulent external airflow.
sentences.chinese: 她说，将球进行打磨，来扰动不稳定的外部气流。

sentences.english: The last is the introduction of disturbation to avoid local optimization.
sentences.chinese: 第四，引入扰动以避免陷入局部优化。

sentences.english: Hatred does not stir the stone men half so much as hunger.
sentences.chinese: 憎恶不及饥饿一半的可能扰动石人。

sentences.english: The orientation of disturbance factor vector is the same as that of vector of material unit stress.
sentences.chinese: 扰动因子向量的方向与材料单元体应力主方向相同。

sentences.english: These actions may increase turbulence and reduce the effectiveness of fume hood containment.
sentences.chinese: 这些动作会增加扰动并降低通风柜的防护性能。

sentences.english: Vibrations of Timoshenko beam per unit disturbance are investigated in theory.
sentences.chinese: 理论上研究了单位力扰动下的悬臂梁的振动。

sentences.english: At the same time it must carefully study how to distinguish from disturbance and forewarning.
sentences.chinese: 然而，如何区分干扰和前兆扰动还需仔细研究。

sentences.english: The health professional usually faces inner turbulence when caring for the suffering of others.
sentences.chinese: 面对病苦死亡，医护人员必然产生内在情绪的扰动。

sentences.english: In agreement with the prediction of stability analysis, perturbation waves don't propagate circumferentially.
sentences.chinese: 与稳定性预测一致，扰动波不沿周向传播。

sentences.english: The presumable range of initial disturbances for rocket under random excitation has been given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了在随机激励作用下火箭初始扰动的可能域。

sentences.english: An iterative method is designed to advance the Ishikawa iteration and solve perturbed equations of accretive operators.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了用迭代法求解增生算子紧扰动方程。

sentences.english: Third harmonic conversion of aberrated laser beam. Chin. J.
sentences.chinese: 位相扰动对三次谐波转换的影响。

sentences.english: A quantum computer would use entangled qubits to process information.
sentences.chinese: 量子计算机可以利用扰动量位来处理数据。

sentences.english: The atomization process is more sensitive to disturbance than vaporization.
sentences.chinese: 雾化过程比汽化过程对扰动更为敏感。

sentences.english: In this paper, ionospheric disturbances during geomagnetic storms at the Great Wall station in Antarctic are studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了磁暴期间南极长城站的电离层扰动特性。

sentences.english: The power system instability caused by oscillation under periodical load disturbance was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了电力系统在周期性负荷扰动下的振荡失稳问题。

definition: to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
(of trains) up (i.e. towards the capital)/(of river boats) to go against the current/to submit (a document) to higher authorities
(of water, prices etc) to rise and fall
